body: On this tour you will enjoy three of the area's prime brewing locations or two breweries and one distillery. All tasting fees are included. At this time you are required to order a small item of food from the menu which is not included in the price of the tour. Transportation is included from anywhere in Santa Barbara. Tours of the beer making process are based on the availability of the brewery staff and the discretion of the guide.
title: Santa Barbara Beer (or Beer/Distillery) Tasting Tour

email.startTime: 11:30  (we will call you on your cell phone when we are almost there to pick you up).
email.description: On this tour you will enjoy three of the area's prime brewing locations or two breweries and one distillery. All tasting fees are included. You can choose to order lunch at the first tasting but it is not included in the price of the tour. Transportation is included from anywhere in Santa Barbara. Tours of the beer making process are based on the availability of the brewery staff and the discretion of the guide.
email.description2: All beer tour guests must be over 21 years old and provide valid ID in order to go beer tasting.
email.gratuity: Please bring cash to tip your guide.
